entities.name: landing
entities.description: The landing is described as the place where most of the class was already assembled.

entities.name: class
entities.description: The class is mentioned as being already assembled on the landing.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as nudging Harry and pointing at the ceiling.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as reading the brass plaque on the trapdoor.

entities.name: sibyll trelawney
entities.description: Sibyll Trelawney is introduced as the Divination teacher.

entities.name: trapdoor
entities.description: The trapdoor is described as having a brass plaque on it.

entities.name: ladder
entities.description: A silvery ladder descends from the trapdoor.

entities.name: classroom
entities.description: Harry emerges into a strange-looking classroom.

relationships.description: Ron nudges Harry and points at the ceiling.
A silvery ladder descends from the trapdoor.
Harry emerges into the strangest-looking classroom he had ever seen.
